numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that every listed sport has more people of color than white coaches.
2. In every sport category except Major League Soccer, approximately 50 percent or more of the people are people of color.
3. Major League Soccer is almost 50 percent people of color and 50 percent white coaches.
4. I wonder why Major League Soccer is almost 50-50 but the other sports are different by 50 percent or more.
5. I am a person of color.
6. This situation does not impact my community in a bad way.
7. In our world, there are more Hispanics than white people.
8. In our world, there are more Africans than white people.
9. In our world, there are more Asians than white people.
10. In sports, there are more people of color than other people.
